sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Home Depot ( HD ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.5%.
Year to date, Home Depot has lost about 3.1% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Boeing ( BA ), trading down 1.3%.
Boeing is lower by about 6.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading down 1.3%, and Verizon ( VZ ), trading up 0.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
